name: Fusion of the Street Art and Sewon village life in Yogyakarta
description:
The village Sewon in Yogyakarta became the mecca for Street Art, you are invited to discover! In January 2014, 33 artists from Java island decorated people houses, shops, warehouses with bright colours and meaningful paintings!

While discovering street art, you will also be able to see village daily life, nice panoramas with rice terraces!   

Also, Sewon village is know for artists living in the neighbourhood, especially ceramics, batik, leather and wood crafting. While visiting the village you will see the workshops of the artists and production being made locally. If there will be a wish, you will be able to buy artwork produced straight from the one, who makes it.
